data.eml:eml: Helobdellablinni sp. n. (Hirudinida, Glossiphoniidae) a new species inhabiting Montezuma Well, Arizona, USA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beresic-Perrins, Rebecca K., Govedich, Fredric R., Banister, Kelsey, Bonnie A. Bain,, Rose, Devin, Shuster, Stephen M. (2017): Helobdellablinni sp. n. (Hirudinida, Glossiphoniidae) a new species inhabiting Montezuma Well, Arizona, USA. ZooKeys 661: 137-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.661.9728, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.661.9728
